entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT\Methodical\eh\finallyexec\nestedfinallycall_d failing with optimizations on #86561
  • AOT 32-bits #86558
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator Fails with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #86557
    8.0.0
  • Improve debugging experience of Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #86553
  • Improve debugging experience of Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #86550
    Future
  • Optimizer should try to reuse identical memory address values in register #86549
    Future
  • The size calculated to be negative and cause Access Violation when doing vxsort vectorized_partition #86548

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add async version of ThreadStart and ParameterizedThreadStart callback #86454
  • Resource message stripping not compatible with our event sources #81459
  • [API Proposal]: NoGC callback #66039
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a test for the first chance exception event to NativeAOT smoke tests #86560
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerDisplay for SearchValues #86559
    area-System.Runtime
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Guarded devirtualization: devirtualize dual-morphic interface calls on NativeAOT #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase timeouts on perf-slow pipeline (because of current load on queues). #86547
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector64<T>/Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • Make merged test wrappers single file friendly #86428
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use VEX xorps to zero a zmm reg #86555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Remove ZMM_RECOMMENDED_THRESHOLD workaround #86552
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop using LocalizationResources within framework #86430
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Baseline a couple more JIT tests #86429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2185092 #86535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Switch basic block successors to a visitor pattern #86543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Vectorize shorter buffers for CRC-32 on Intel #86539
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
